structure.unit: NOTARIES PUBLIC AND COMMISSIONERS OF FOREIGN DEEDS

law.catch_line: Recognition of notarial acts performed outside this state.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 1. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1970.
